press_button_single_brew.description: Press the button once to initiate the single cup brewing process.

press_button_double_brew.description: Press the button twice to initiate the double cup brewing process.

deep_clean_button.description: Wipe the button thoroughly to ensure cleanliness.

press_button_shutdown.description: Press and hold the button to turn off the coffee machine.

press_button_once.description: Press the button once to initiate the brewing process.

wipe_button_once.description: Wipe the button once for cleaning.

engage_button.description: Engage the button to turn on the coffee machine.

refresh_button.description: Clean the button to maintain cleanliness.

press_button.description: Press the button to activate the coffee machine.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning and hygiene.

release_button.description: Release the button to stop the coffee machine.

wipe_button.description: Wipe the button to clean it after use.

rotate_knob_max_strength.description: Rotate the knob all the way to select maximum coffee strength.

rotate_knob_min_strength.description: Rotate the knob all the way back to select minimum coffee strength.

rotate_knob_timer_setting.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the timing of brewing.

polish_knob_proper_rotation.description: Wipe the knob to ensure its smooth rotation.

rotate_knob_clockwise.description: Rotate the knob clockwise to increase the heat of the coffee.

rotate_knob_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the knob anticlockwise to decrease the heat of the coffee.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob for hygiene and better functionality.

adjust_knob.description: Adjust the knob to modify the coffee settings.

polish_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it spins unobstructed.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to select the coffee strength or type.

rotate_knob_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the knob counterclockwise to decrease the coffee strength.

wipe_knob.description: Wipe the knob to clean it after use.

sanitize_coffee_machine.description: Give the coffee machine body a wipe to keep it free from dirt or germs

clean_coffee_machine_after_maintenance.description: Wipe the coffee machine body after maintenance work.

clean_coffee_machine_for_guests.description: Wipe the coffee machine body for a clean appearance when there are guests.

clean_body.description: Clean the machine body to maintain hygiene.

purify_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to preserve clean working conditions and extend its lifespan.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the coffee machine body to maintain hygienic conditions and machine longevity.

wipe_coffee_machine.description: Wipe the coffee machine body to remove coffee stains.

place_cup.description: Place the cup in the coffee machine's cup holder for coffee dispensation.

make_quick_coffee.description: Quickly brew coffee by pressing the button once and rotating the knob slightly.

make_strong_coffee.description: Brew strong coffee by pressing the button twice and rotating the knob all the way.

clean_and_shutdown.description: Clean the entire machine and shutdown.

make_coffee_and_clean.description: Brew coffee and clean the machine afterwards.

prepare_coffee.description: Press the button once and rotate the knob clockwise to prepare hot coffee.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire machine including button, knob, and body to maintain long-lasting operational efficiency.

prepare_light_coffee.description: Press the button once and rotate the knob anticlockwise to prepare light coffee.

sanitize_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the whole coffee machine, including the button, knob, and body to maintain sanitation and good performance.

operate_coffee_machine.description: Engage the button and adjust the knob to set the preferred settings and operate the coffee machine.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, including the button, knob, and body to maintain hygiene and proper functionality.

activate_coffee_machine.description: Press the button and rotate the knob to select desired settings and activate the coffee machine.

clean_entire_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, including the button, knob, and body after every usage.

prepare_coffee_machine.description: Prepare the coffee machine for use by pressing the button and rotating the knob to desired settings.
